page.title: 03Joanna's Manifesto/Newark
page.content: I think that Newark needs a bit more entertainment for youth. The sport centre has good facilities but not everybody is interested in sport. It would be useful to have a centre where young people could get together to share hobbies such as chess or music and crafts. Also for the young teenagers or under a weekly amusement arcade or a park would be better. For the shopping business there should be a few more appliance shops or computer shops. I think that a few more theatres would be appreciated, though cinemas are going quite well. There should be more services and clubs for the elderly, or disabled because they would be more happier. Another important thing is road safety, a few more zebra crossings or traffic lights because the rate of accidents is quite high.
